title: Design database schema for blog system
description: Create ER diagram and define tables for users, posts, comments, and tags with proper relationships and indexing strategy.

title: Implement user authentication
description: Add JWT-based authentication with login, registration, password hashing, and token refresh mechanism.

title: Optimize slow API endpoints
description: Profile API performance, identify bottlenecks, and optimize database queries using indexing and query refactoring.

title: Write unit tests for services layer
description: Add pytest-based unit tests covering business logic and edge cases with proper mocking of database sessions.

title: Implement pagination for list APIs
description: Add limit-offset and cursor-based pagination for listing endpoints with metadata in response.

title: Add request validation schemas
description: Define Pydantic models for request and response validation ensuring strict typing and field constraints.

title: Set up Docker environment
description: Create Dockerfile and docker-compose configuration for FastAPI app with PostgreSQL and Redis services.

title: Implement caching layer
description: Integrate Redis caching for frequently accessed endpoints and implement cache invalidation strategy.

title: Configure logging system
description: Set up structured logging with log levels, JSON formatting, and request tracing support.

title: Implement role-based access control
description: Add RBAC support with admin and user roles restricting access to sensitive endpoints.

title: Handle N+1 query problem
description: Refactor ORM queries using eager loading strategies to prevent N+1 query performance issues.

title: Add soft delete functionality
description: Implement soft delete using is_deleted flag and ensure queries filter out logically deleted records.

title: Implement background task processing
description: Use Celery or FastAPI BackgroundTasks to handle asynchronous jobs like email notifications.

title: Integrate Elasticsearch for search
description: Set up Elasticsearch integration and sync data from PostgreSQL for full-text search capabilities.

title: Add OpenAPI documentation enhancements
description: Improve API documentation with detailed endpoint descriptions, examples, and proper response models.

title: Implement rate limiting
description: Add rate limiting middleware to prevent abuse using Redis-based request counters.

title: Secure environment variables
description: Move secrets to environment variables and configure Secret Manager for production deployment.

title: Add health check endpoint
description: Create a health check endpoint to verify database connectivity and service availability.

title: Refactor project structure
description: Reorganize project folders following clean architecture principles separating routers, services, and repositories.

title: Deploy application to GCP
description: Deploy FastAPI application to Google Cloud Run with proper IAM roles and CI/CD integration.
